name: Puffer Finance
description: Puffer is a native liquid restaking protocol on EigenLayer with 500,000+ ETH deposited and 5,000+ node operators registered. Current NoOps model requires 2 ETH bond (converted to pufETH earning restaking yield) plus minimum 28 Validator Tickets (VTs). Operators retain 100% of consensus/execution rewards plus EigenLayer AVS rewards. Season 2 points program active.

docsIntegration.text: Documentation at https://docs.puffer.fi/ covering node requirements, VT system, and pufETH mechanics
VT (Validator Ticket) system: 1 VT burns per day while operating. Minimum 7 VTs maintained or face ejection. VTs are ERC-20 tradeable tokens.
Originally-planned 1 ETH bond option using Secure-Signer (TEE) unavailable on mainnet as of October 2025. Puffer V2 plans minimal pufETH collateral.
